function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Extensive spread of the coronavirus","Impact":"High death rates and limited hospital capacity","Mitigation":"Implement strict public health measures, increase vaccination rates, and enforce quarantine protocols","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, monitoring systems, and telehealth solutions","People":"General population","Owner":"Public health authorities and government agencies"},{"Description":"Isolation of infected patients in homes","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission within households","Mitigation":"Provide separate isolation facilities for infected patients, educate households on infection prevention, and facilitate remote medical consultations","Technologies":"Remote monitoring devices, telemedicine platforms, and educational apps","People":"Infected patients and their households","Owner":"Healthcare providers and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Close interaction in public places after the end of quarantine","Impact":"Increased risk of infection transmission in public settings","Mitigation":"Promote physical distancing, encourage vaccination, and improve ventilation in public spaces","Technologies":"Occupancy monitoring systems, air quality sensors, and crowd management solutions","People":"General population","Owner":"Local government and businesses"}]}
